divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching tv near my window. I was layed in the bed, every night i do that, i can see airplanes passing through the window. Ive saw many planes passing, so i was used to see them passing. Last night, i was watching tv and i saw a light passing through, i thought it was an airplane, but then i saw like an orange like and then i supossed it wasnt an airplane. I saw the object carefully and i noted that it had like 9 lights turning around the object and the entire UFO was moving faster than a plane. I saw the UFO descending and waited it for raise again but nothing. I took my handycam and recorded some of the UFOs that were passing in the next minutes, they were at a far distance, so i had to use the digital zoom of the camera. I lose the sight of the object because the houses in the far hide the UFO's.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Merida
There were no other sightings in Merida on or around October 28th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
